response.original_title: Antarctica - Tales From The End Of The World
response.overview: Antarctica is remote and inhospitable, yet one of the world’s most beautiful landscapes. Only by icebreaker can we reach the continent and Southern Ocean’s stormy isolated islands. Seals, Emperor penguins, seabirds and numerous other animals live and breed here, defying the life-threatening environment of the vast ice desert.
response.title: Antarctica - Tales From The End Of The World
